jobDescription: Developing mobile applicatons using React Native and integrate it with Frappe backend
Enhancing applications by identifying opportunities for improvement, making recommendations and implementing features based on the business requirements
Maintaining and improving existing codebases and peer review code changes
Create website layout using HTML, CSS, Javascript/jQuery and Wordpress as CMS
Integrate back-end services and database using PHP, MySQL
Cooperate with UI/UX designers to match visual design intent
Formulate academy curriculum for full stack development (HTML, CSS, Javascript/jQuery, Bootstrap, PHP, MySQL)
Teach full stack development curriculum to students and keep track of student's progress
Report student's progress and discuss ways to improve student's progress with the their parents and the academy owner
